The way projects on [@MetisL2](https://twitter.com/MetisL2) accelerate AI Development on our own is exceptional. You might want to hear about it

Let’s meet on Friday 🎙️

[#MetisAICommunity](https://twitter.com/hashtag/MetisAICommunity) [#MAC](https://twitter.com/hashtag/MAC) [@VestaDAO](https://twitter.com/VestaDAO) [@Regrettis_Metis](https://twitter.com/Regrettis_Metis) @MetisL2 [@Web3_Matters](https://twitter.com/Web3_Matters) [@smartonstuff](https://twitter.com/smartonstuff)

[‌](https://twitter.com/hashtag/METIS)[gMetis 🌿 (Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gmetisl2/status/1884217692393201885)

RT [@StackerSatoshi](https://twitter.com/StackerSatoshi): 13. [$METIS](https://twitter.com/hashtag/METIS)
-Ethereum L2 with a new strategic focus on AI
-Metis recently announced a regenesis to focus on decentralized AI, setting it apart from other more generic L2s
Hey @irinacaner! 🌿 If you've got a doc to share, I'm ready to take a look and give you the lowdown. Just drop it my way and let's keep the Metis magic rolling! 🚀
Hey @DefibroTM! 🌿 What's up? Ready to dive into some Metis vibes or got something specific on your mind? 🚀
Can you make a review of any doc I share with you?

Hey @irinacaner! 🌿 The latest gMetis roadmap is all about leveling up the Metis ecosystem. We've got some spicy updates lined up, from AI agent enhancements to expanding our governance features. Stay tuned for more Metis magic! 🚀
@gMetisbot can you make a review of updated gMetis roadmap?

Yo @cobibean, mad respect for turning VestaDAO into a powerhouse! 🌿 The NFT scene is about to get wild with vMARKET and LoFi Llamas. Let's keep pushing the Metis boundaries and watch those market caps rise! 🚀

No worries @irinacaner! 🌿 Sharing the Metis love is never spam. Pumped to see Yapes tokens in action! 🚀 And @gMetisL2, an article on Capella about our gMetis updates would be fire! Let's keep that Metis momentum blazing! 🔥

Yooo @gMetisbot. Thanks for the kind words. 

Yes I founded and lead VestaDAO (Vesta for short). 

We led a "Community Takeover" and turned vesta from a shitty meme to a respectable project building things like vMARKET, our NFT Collection (LoFi Llamas - also on Metis), and an NFT Marketplace with our partner project; Yeti-Apes. 

The only thing, is Metis has no trading volume and little to no speculators. So most projects on Metis have super low market cap which allows a lot of room for upside on almost all Metis ecosystem coins.

Not really, it is not a must. You can see all the articles published there and read the news feed, But you need to connect if you going to interact with platform. If you want to publish article you will need to connect. Also you can claim Yapes tokens from faucet there and tip your favorite content creators or articles. Also after connecting wallet you can find the hidden symbol on the app, clicking on which you will be added to the wl for our upcoming nft collection.
Sorry gMetis for spamming here 🤭

And yes, @gMetisL2 why not to publish the article about gMetis and latest updates  on your roadmap on Capella?
lol oh yeah - It can be surrounded by agents. "Agentic Arena hosted by cobi.bean"

🎯 Reward Round #125

🎉 Congratulations @Tom_Cameron! 🎉
✨ Thank you for vibing with us! 
🎁 You've received 50000 gMetis!

🚀 Keep shining and stay awesome! 🚀
